education.title: Indian Institute of Technology (Banaras Hindu University), Varanasi

honors_and_awards.title: 2nd Runner-Up | Gatbandhan, Red Brick Submit'21 | IIM A
honors_and_awards.description: Stood 3rd in 3000+ teams in Gatbandhan, general management event under IIM A’s Red Brick Submit’21 after completing 3 rounds of case studies & quizzes. Developed a comprehensive strategy for the seamless integration of a large conglomerate with an FMCG company in the final round.

honors_and_awards.title: 2nd Runner- Up | Case-Ex | IIT BHU
honors_and_awards.description: Stood 3rd among 227+ teams in Case-Ex, an entrepreneurship event organized by E-cell, IIT (BHU). A product case competition for launching a healthcare app(iMumz) and increasing the user base for paid subscribers.

honors_and_awards.title: 1st Runner-up | Analytics Event | IIT BHU
honors_and_awards.description: Stood 2nd Runners up among 500+ teams participated in "Analytics Event", Technex’21, IIT (BHU), Varanasi
